ImprovementType.Description: Temples of Harmony increase growth in the city and reduce Unrest in all cities.
Temples of Strife increase Unrest in all cities, but improve the prowess of faction units

GameModifier.Provides: +1 Level for all faction Trained Units
All faction units receieve +5% physical attack bonus

ImprovementType.Description: A Sacred Shrine increases the rate that your faction produces Faith.
Wooden Walls improve a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.
Wooden Walls improve a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.
Forts bolster a city's defenses by providing it with Archers and giving an Initiative bonus to City Defenders.
Clerics provide healing and aid to the city's inhabitants. They reduce unrest in the city and increase your Fame.
The rituals of Shrines provide peace of mind for a city's citizens, reducing Unrest and improving your Fame. Arvos brings harmony and protection to his people.
The rituals of Shrines provide peace of mind for a city's citizens, reducing Unrest and improving your Fame. Hadollon is the favoured god of laborers and warriors.
The rituals of Shrines provide peace of mind for a city's citizens, reducing Unrest and improving your Fame. Lialdir is the god of health and prosperity.
Temples reduce Unrest and produce Mana based on the Essence of the city they are constructed in. Arvos brings harmony and protection to his people.
Temples reduce Unrest and produce Mana based on the Essence of the city they are constructed in. Hadollon is the favoured god of laborers and warriors.
Temples reduce Unrest and produce Mana based on the Essence of the city they are constructed in. Lialdir is the god of health and prosperity.

GameModifier.Provides: Heals 5 Hit Points per Season to all stationed units
GameModifier.UpgradeComparisonText: Hit Points per Season to all stationed units

Hedge Walls improve a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.

Clerics provide healing and aid to the city's inhabitants. They reduce unrest in the city and increase your Fame.
The rituals of Shrines provide peace of mind for a city's citizens, reducing Unrest and improving your Fame.
Dawn Temples increase growth in the city and reduce Unrest in all cities. Units trained here have a touch of the divine.
Clerics provide healing and aid to the city's inhabitants. They reduce unrest in the city and increase your Fame.
The rituals of Shrines provide peace of mind for a city's citizens, reducing Unrest and improving your Fame.
Temples of Essence reduce Unrest and produce Mana based on the Essence of the city they are constructed in.

Establishing a Tree Shrine in a city helps attract forest allies. Once the Tree Shrine is constructed, a Forest Grove resource will be created nearby that can be used to train Forest Guardians. Also reduces Unrest 5%.

GameModifier.Provides: Creates a Forest Grove resource nearby which can be used to train Forest Guardians.

ImprovementType.Description: Sprite camps can be built on Mushroom Groves to recruit Sprites.
Treekin Homes can be built on Treekin Groves to recruit Treekin Giants.
Produces mana, and increases health regeneration of friendly units in this outpost's borders.

GameModifier.Provides: +5 health regeneration for friendly units in Zone of Control

ImprovementType.Description: Increases the player's borders and improves their visibility, and increases spell resistance of friendly units in Zone of Control.

GameModifier.Provides: +10 Spell Resistance for friendly units in Zone of Control

ImprovementType.Description: A Totem reduces unrest in the city.

A Totem reduces unrest in the city and increase your Fame.
A Life Totem increases Growth and heals stationed units.

GameModifier.Provides: Heals 5 Hit Points per Season to all stationed units
GameModifier.UpgradeComparisonText: Health Regen per Season to stationed units

ImprovementType.Description:
A Totem reduces unrest in the city and increase your Fame.
A Death Totem increases the Attack of stationed units, and adds a Maul chance to trained units.

GameModifier.Provides: +10% chance to Maul when attacking for Trained Units

ImprovementType.Description:
A Totem reduces unrest in the city and increase your Fame.
An Earth Totem increases production in the city, and increases Hit Points of trained units.

A Totem reduces unrest in the city and increase your Fame.
A Spirit Totem increases Defense for stationed units, and Initiative of trained units.

Clerics provide healing and aid to the city's inhabitants. They reduce unrest in the city and increase your Fame.
The rituals of Shrines provide peace of mind for a city's citizens, reducing Unrest and improving your Fame.

The Hall of the Naja reduces Unrest and increases Faith. All Black Naja units recieve +20% Accuracy and are automatically healed at the start of tactical battle. In addition it provides a Black Naja defender when the city is attacked.

GameModifier.Provides: All faction Black Naja units are fully healed at the start of tactical battle
All faction Black Naja units recieve a +20% Accuracy bonus in tactical battle

ImprovementType.Description: The Serpent Sanctorium reduces unrest and increases research in the city you build it in. In addition it provides an increase to Faith production in all of a nation's cities.

Establishing a Sky Sanctum in a city assists channelers in harnessing air energy, as well as providing a bonus to defending units. Additionally, once the Sky Sanctum is constructed, a previously undiscovered Air Shard will be revealed nearby.

GameModifier.Provides: Creates an Air Shard resource nearby

ImprovementType.Description: Establishing a Hallowed Stone in a city assists channelers in harnessing earth energy, as well as providing a bonus to defending units. Additionally, once the Hallowed Stone is constructed, a previously undiscovered Earth Shard will be revealed nearby.

GameModifier.Provides: Creates an Earth Shard resource nearby

ImprovementType.Description: Establishing a Sacred Flame in a city assists channelers in harnessing fire energy, as well as providing a bonus to defending units. Additionally, once the Sacred Flame is constructed, a previously undiscovered Fire Shard will be revealed nearby.

GameModifier.Provides: Creates a Fire Shard resource nearby

ImprovementType.Description: Establishing a Spirit Pool in a city assists channelers in harnessing water energy, as well as providing a bonus to defending units. Additionally, once the Spirit Pool is constructed, a previously undiscovered Water Shard will be revealed nearby.

GameModifier.Provides: Creates a Water Shard resource nearby

ImprovementType.Description: Clerics provide healing and aid to the city's inhabitants. They reduce unrest in the city and increase your Fame.
The rituals of Shrines provide peace of mind for a city's citizens, reducing Unrest and improving your Fame.

The city's weak are sacrificed, reducing its Growth. All units trained here are infused with Beastic energies, granting them a bonus to Hit Points and Attack. In addition a Beast spawns in the city if it is attacked.

The city's weak are sacrificed, reducing its Growth. All units trained here are infused with demonic energies, granting them a bonus to Hit Points and Attack. In addition a Demon spawns in the city if it is attacked.

The city's weak are sacrificed, reducing its Growth. All units trained here are infused with demonic energies, granting them a bonus to Hit Points and Attack. In addition a Demon spawns in the city if it is attacked.
Stables can be built on Wild Horses to provide extra food for Harrdian.
Harridan Dens provide you with a Harridan every 5 seasons. In addition a Bound Harridan bolsters the city defences if it is attacked.
